bibl.title: Tax collection and grain measures in Roman Egpyt. An account involving paralēmptai and a receipt issued by the sitologoi of Berenikis Aigialou. With some notes on measure standards (paralēmptikon, epaiton)
bibl.note: 1. Account involving paralēmptai [= P. Fay. 300 descr.]. Euhemeria, late I century AD (?). - 2. Acknowledgment by the sitologoi of Berenikis Aigialou [= P. Fay. 342 descr.]. Berenikis Aigialou, AD 147/8 or 148/9 (?).
bibl.seg: Nicola Reggiani, Tax Collection and Grain Measures in Roman Egpyt. An Account Involving paralēmptai and a Receipt Issued by the sitologoi of Berenikis Aigialou. With Some Notes on Measure Standards (paralēmptikon, epaiton).

1. Account involving paralēmptai [= P. Fay. 300 descr.]. Euhemeria, late I century AD (?). - 2. Acknowledgment by the sitologoi of Berenikis Aigialou [= P. Fay. 342 descr.]. Berenikis Aigialou, AD 147/8 or 148/9 (?).
